title: 玩家登入显示 your country is bannd from this server 怎么解决？
author: Dashashou
txt_content: 玩家登入显示 your country is bannd from this server 怎么解决？

replies.txt_content:
Dashashou 发表于 2015-10-6 11:52
还是不行
  countries:
  - US
  - GB
  - CN
  countriesBlacklist:

也可以

authme 禁止改国际登入
config里
Protection:
  enableProtection: true
  countries:
  - US
  - GB
  countriesBlacklist:
  - A1
变成
Protection:
  enableProtection: false
  countries:
  - US
  - GB
  countriesBlacklist:
  - A1

replies.author: Dashashou
replies.txt_content:
88158488 发表于 2015-10-6 11:48
authme 禁止改国际登入
config里
Protection:
还是不行
